text: Dāngshí, wǒ yǔ nǐmen dìyuē, bìng jiāng shānyuè shùlì zài nǐmen de shàngmiàn, wǒ shuō: Nǐmen dāng jiānshǒu wǒ suǒ cì nǐmen de jīngdiǎn, bìng dāng tīngcóng. Tāmen shuō: Wǒmen tīng ér bù cóng. Tāmen bù xìndào, gù duì dú zhī ài, yǐ jìnrùnle tāmen de xīnlíng. Nǐ shuō: Rúguǒ nǐmen shì xìnshì, nàmò, nǐmen de xìnyǎng suǒ mìng nǐmen de zhēn èliè!
